use std::io; // prelude

use std::cmp::Ordering; // æšä¸¾ç±»å‹

fn main() {
  println!("çŒœæ•°æ¸¸æˆ");   // å®

  let secret_number  = rand::thread_rng().gen_range(1..101); // åŒ…æ‹¬1ï¼Œä¸åŒ…æ‹¬101

  
  loop {

      println!("çŒœæµ‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å­—:");

      let mut guess = String::new(); // mut å¯å˜å˜é‡
      io::stdin().read_line(&mut guess).expect("failed to read line");
  
      // shadowï¼Œ ä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒå˜é‡åè¿›è¡Œè¦†ç›–
      let guess: u32 = guess.trim().parse().expect("please type a number!");  // å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ•´æ•°ç±»å‹

      println!("çŒœæµ‹çš„æ•°å­—æ˜¯ï¼š {}", guess);
      
      match guess.cmp(&secret_number) {
          Ordering::Less => println!("Too small"),
          Ordering::Greater => println!("Too big"),
          Ordering::Equal => {
              println!("You win!");
              break;
          }
      }
  }
   
}
